message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that holds immense value, exceeding $1000000 to me.  While I can't disclose specifics without a non-disclosure agreement, I'm confident it would be highly beneficial for you as well. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This represents a substantial opportunity for you, and I believe we can negotiate further if you're interested. Please let me know your thoughts.
